definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Gold and glass get along well enough and under the right circumstances will attract.
sentences.chinese: 金子和玻璃相安无事，特定环境下它们互相吸引。

sentences.english: But the president's role as commander in chief cut two ways.
sentences.chinese: 但是，总统的角色与统帅的职责无法相安无事。

sentences.english: As long for a little bit let she 1:00, basically tin live attach peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 只要稍微让着她一点，基本上就能相安无事了。

sentences.english: The little guys got along just fine while the big guys were fighting.
sentences.chinese: 在大人物打仗的时候，这些小人物却相安无事。

pinyin: jing3 shui3 bu4 fan4 he2 shui3

definition: peaceful coexistence of nations, societies etc
to live in harmony/to get along with each other
lit. breeze is still, waves are quiet (idiom); tranquil environment/all is quiet/a dead calm (at sea)
content with one's lot/knowing one's place

pinyin: zheng1 yi1 zhi1 yan3 bi4 yi1 zhi1 yan3

definition: lit. you die, I live (idiom); irreconcilable adversaries/two parties cannot coexist
completely incompatible/lit. incompatible as fire and water
to have an acrimonious falling-out/to shed all pretense of cordiality/to tear into each other
